TextBlock.Text: ANALYTICNOMAI: Who is responsible for the campsite on the large planetoid near the center of this area? It represents an excellent location for us to build more permanent residence, and I am quite shocked that someone is keeping it to themselves.

NOMAILEADER: I am inclined to believe our friends, ANALYTICNOMAI, and I do not believe that any of our clan would be willing to keep such a secret from the group. Are you certain that the campsite you saw could not have been a natural formation?
ANALYTICNOMAI: I am absolutely certain. There was a small ring of stones with still smoldering firewood inside.
NOMAILEADER: Quite an interesting find ANALYTICNOMAI! We should make our way over there and investigate at once. Do you remember where we can find this planetoid?
ANALYTICNOMAI: I was concerned that I would be unable to find it again, so I planted a signal beacon on the opposite side of the planetoid as the campsite.
SPOOKEDNOMAI: I have been here putting together shelters, I did not realize there were any other bodies out there.
CURIOUSNOMAI: I poked around a bit, but I have not yet located this large planetoid that you speak of.
SPOOKEDNOMAI: Is it possible that the campsite was made by other members of our clan? Perhaps they followed us through our makeshift warp setup and are stranded here as well.
ANALYTICNOMAI: As much as I would hope for your hypothesis to be true, there were no other structures indicative of Nomai presence, and it has long been outside of our culture to construct campfires.
CURIOUSNOMAI: Are you saying that there is a campsite in here that none of us made? That would imply that there are other sentient beings here besides us!
